vision.title: Our Vision
vision.quote: CITCI envisions morally, spirituality, intellectuality formed and digital savvy graduates who promote life, environment.
paragraphs: The CITCI Library envisions graduates who are morally upright, spiritually grounded, intellectually equipped, and digitally adeptâ€”champions of life and environmental care in their communities.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.quote: The library well be a user, centric hub information, learning and creativity that engaged the campus and the broader community.
paragraphs: The library serves as a user-centered hub for information, learning, and creativity, fostering engagement within the campus and the wider community to support academic excellence and personal growth.

organizationStructure.heading: Organizational Structure
organizationStructure.intro: CITCI's organizational structure ensures efficient governance, clear roles, and collaborative leadership, all working together to uphold its mission of holistic education and community service.

members.name: Rev. Fr. Marlon E. Lacal, O CARM, Ph, D.
